Another 50-60 abused woman recruit control group randomize shelter Po Leung Kuk ( Shelter C ) , subject receive standard shelter service abuse woman . It hypothesize subject Treatment Group would report significant improvement self-esteem , social support , quality life ; reduction level depression , symptom Posttraumatic Stress Disorder 3 month service delivery , compare control group .
